name: Manifesto Games
tagline: Turning your ideas into breakthrough games.
description:
Manifesto Games is a studio founded in 2005 and specialized in the development of casual games from ideation through live operations. We are experts in three main areas:
Casual Games
Casual Games are our passion, specially Classic Action Arcade, Time Management, Tower Defense and Puzzle games. Our knack is to take a classical mechanic and boost it with a new twist. Our studio is trusted by companies such as Bandai Namco America, DeNA, Gamblit Gaming, Gogii and MightyPlay. We offer full development services, live operations and companion apps.
Educational Games
Our award-winning team of experts create games to promote interactive experiences that motivate and actively engage players in the learning process. Trusted by Pearson, Santillana, Somos Educação, and more.
Kids Games
Our team is specialized on the creation of gaming platforms for kids that fosters the brand’s content - like characters, books and videos - with a smart porting to digital games. We have already developed game projects for brands such as Disney, Sea World, My Little Pony, and more.
We are here to help turning your revolutionary ideas into breakthrough games.
